name: DBZ You Fool! - Angry Kamehameha
text:
When a "Goku" monster(s) you control is targeted for an attack or by an opponent's card effect (except during the Damage Step): Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters, and if you do, the targeted "Goku" monster(s) cannot active their effects for the rest of this turn.

Concept by MauGamesLOL
